  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Saver
extends AbstractDataSink
implements WekaWrapper, EnvironmentHandler
    Saves data sets using weka.core.converter classes
    Version:
    $Revision: 10221 $
    Author:
    Stefan Mutter
